file.title: ID user

p.text: This ID is generated for any computer on the basis of registry data. Software and hardware replacement in most cases has NO influence on ID, but exceptions can happen sometimes.

p.textAll: ID user is constantly changing: at themoment it can be "2323243...", but then - "432532320...". But don't be confused. Encrypted content remains the same, only the display format is changing.
